info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:48PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN QUAY AND CURRY COUNTIES THROUGH 1030 PM MDT... At 947 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Broadview, or 25 miles north of Clovis, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clovis, Texico, Melrose, Grady, Ranchvale, Broadview, Bellview and Pleasant Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for east central New Mexico.
